body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                    Garden Conservancy   65 Photos  Photos of flora commonly found on Alcatraz Island, presented by volunteers of the Garden Conservancy. To find out more on how you can volunteer visit Support Your Park.          Alcatraz Seabirds   23 Photos  See these charismatic seabirds nest on the island          Prison Artifacts   9 Photos  A look at some of the items from the island's prison era now preserved in the park's archives.             Indians of All Tribes   9 Photos  Photos from the Indians of All Tribes occupation of Alcatraz. These were taken by Swedish photographer Bengt af Geijerstam in July of 1970, and are copyrighted by the photographer.
title: Alcatraz Island: Photos & Multimedia
